span.span:
Pursuant to Governor Northam's recent announcement, Botetourt County Public Schools will be closed for the remainder of the academic school year.
Please check the What's New Today section of our COVID-19 website for latest updates.

div.h2: WELCOME TO BOTETOURT COUNTY PUBLIC SCHOOLS
div.p: It is the mission of Botetourt County Public Schools to ensure that all students participate in quality learning experiences necessary to grow, to adapt and to meet the challenges of responsible citizenship in a changing global society.

div.div: The Botetourt County School Board will hold a Regular Meeting on Thursday, May 7, 2020, at 6:30 p.m. The meeting will be held at the Central Administration Building. Meeting to be broadcast on Facebook Live.

a.title: Dr. Larry A. Massie Named Interim Superintendent

div.a: Dr. Larry A. Massie Named Interim Superintendent
div.div: Press statement regarding our interim superintendent.
div.a: Read More about Dr. Larry A. Massie Named Interim Superintendent

div.p: The Virginia Department of Education and Botetourt County Schools do not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, age, religion, political affiliation, disability, or gender in its educational programs or activities. No person shall be denied educational opportunities solely because of impairment, which is unrelated to the ability to engage in activities involved in the program for which application has been made.
